title: Build an Expense Category Tracker
description: Create an expense tracker that counts spending by category using dictionary methods. Use the get() method pattern for counting and iterate through expenses to display totals.
instructions:
1. Create a list of expense tuples: `expenses = [('food', 25), ('transport', 15), ('food', 30), ('entertainment', 50), ('transport', 20)]`
2. Create an empty dictionary `category_totals`
3. Loop through expenses and use `get()` with default 0 to accumulate totals per category
4. Print each category and its total using `.items()`
5. Calculate and print the grand total using `.values()`
